title: How to Make a Very Simple Vest

steps.headline: Gather your materials.
steps.description: Get the 2 types of fabric you want, long and wide enough to wrap around your body. Get several buttons, and a sewing machine.

steps.headline: Mark the shape of the vest with a pen or chalk on both of the fabrics.
steps.description: . Make the collar and and draw the holes for your arms.

steps.headline: Cut out the vest very slowly and carefully including the holes for the arms.
steps.description: It has to be exact (or as close as possible).

steps.headline: Put the outsides of the vest together and sew the outsides together except for the bottom.
Turn it in-side-out (actually right side in!

text: Gather your materials. Get the 2 types of fabric you want, long and wide enough to wrap around your body. Get several buttons, and a sewing machine. Mark the shape of the vest with a pen or chalk on both of the fabrics. . Make the collar and and draw the holes for your arms. Cut out the vest very slowly and carefully including the holes for the arms. It has to be exact (or as close as possible). Put the outsides of the vest together and sew the outsides together except for the bottom.  Turn it in-side-out (actually right side in! )and sew the bottom. Hand sew the buttons.
